oai_dc:dc.dc:title: McGavock Porch
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Black and white photograph of Carton Plantation's back porch.
Five generals, Patrick R. Cleburne, Otho F. Strahl, States Right Gist, John C. Carter, John Adams, and Hiram B. Granbury from the Battle of Franklin were laid at McGavock porch before burial.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Granbury, Hiram Bronson, 1831-1864; Porches; Photographs; Plantations
Porches; Photographs; Plantations
